title: Viticulture Commission
body: It had its installation session on September 6, 1909, and oversees the production of Madeira fortified wine, organizes statistics, etc. It was created by article 31 of the Law of September 18, 1908, and reformed by the Decree of October 1 of the same year. The first wine regulation of Madeira is from March 11, 1909.

6 de Setembro de 1909: Installation session of the Viticulture Commission
